# interactionState

**Instance Property**

The interaction state when the current page changes.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var interactionState: UIPageControl.InteractionState { get }
```

## Customizing the interaction state

- **allowsContinuousInteraction**: A Boolean value that determines whether the page control allows continuous interaction.
- **UIPageControl.InteractionState**: Constants that define the interaction states of the page control.
